item.title: Simple Stateful Firewall with nftables
item.description: The nftables is a subsystem of the Linux kernel providing filtering and classification of network packets/datagrams/frames.

item.title: Stateful Firewall with iptables
item.description: ::::info iptables is replaced by nftables starting in Debian 10 (Buster) ::::
